info.gloss: by means of; thereby, therefore; consider as; in order to

words: to use; according to; so as to; for; by
do at all costs; make an all-out effort
so as not to; in order to avoid; lest
down to; up to; to such an extent as to...
sufficient to ...; so much so that; sufficiently
extraWords: that level or higher; that amount or more; the above-mentioned; (used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
that level or lower; that amount or less; the following
to give; to impose; to apply
(after a noun N and before a predicate P) the reason why N P; Example: 我之所以討厭他|我之所以讨厌他[wo3 zhi1 suo3 yi3 tao3 yan4 ta1] "the reason why I dislike him (is ...)"
apart from; other than; except for; external; outside of; on the other side of; beyond

in addition; moreover; (used before a disyllabic verb to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned); to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb); to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
able to; so that sb can; enabling; in order to; finally in a position to; with sth in view
with this; thereby; thus; because of this
in order to; so as to
(so as) to avoid; to prevent; (just) in case
